pages.text: 19|2|ninre raksitav tanre dasanaya sakariyyaykk ceyta anugrahatte sambandhicculla vivaranamatre it‌
19|3|(atayat‌) addeham tanre raksitavine patukke vilicc prart'thicca sandarbham
19|4|addeham parannu: enre raksitave, enre ellukal balahinamayikkalinnirikkunnu. talayanenkil naraccu tilannunnatayirikkunnu. enre raksitave, ninneat prart'thiccitt nan bhagyam kettavanayittilla
19|5|enikk purake varanulla bandhumitradikalepparri enikk bhayamakunnu. enre bharyayanenkil vandhyayumakunnu. atinal ninre pakkal ninn ni enikk oru bandhuve (avakasiye) nalkename
19|6|enikk avan anantaravakasiyayirikkum. ya'akhub kutumbattinum avan anantaravakasiyayirikkum. enre raksitave, avane ni (evarkkum) trptippettavanakkukayum ceyyename
19|7|he, sakariyya, tirccayayum ninakk nam oru ankuttiyepparri santeasavartta ariyikkunnu. avanre per yah‌ya ennakunnu. mump nam areyum avanre per ullavarakkiyittilla
19|8|addeham parannu: enre raksitave, enikkennane oru ankuttiyuntakum? enre bharya vandhyayakunnu. nananenkil vard'dhakyattal cukkicculinna avasthayilettiyirikkunnu
19|9|avan (allahu) parannu: annane tanne. mump ni yateannumallatirunnappeal ninne nan srsticcirikke, it enne sambandhiccitattealam oru nis'sara karyam matraman enn ninre raksitav prakhyapiccirikkunnu

19|10|addeham (sakariyya) parannu: ni enikk oru drstantam erpetuttittarename. avan (allahu) parannu: ninakkulla drstantam vaikalyameannum illattavanayirikkettanne janannaleat munn ratri (divasam) ni sansarikkatirikkalakunnu
19|11|annane addeham prart'thanamandapattil ninn tanre janannalute atukkalekk purappettu. ennitt‌, ninnal ravileyum vaikunneravum allahuvinre parisud'dhiye prakirttikkuka enn avareat angyam kaniccu
